testcase.name: TC_01 user should be able to go to Amazon website
User should not be able to sign in with invalid credentials
testcase.system-out: Given go to Amazon url......................................................passed Then navigate to sign in page...............................................passed Then enter invalid email address to the email box...........................passed Then click continue button..................................................passed Then enter invalid password to the password box.............................passed Then click sign in button...................................................passed Then verify sign in is not successful.......................................passed
